name: Menu.CheckboxItem
description: A list of options that appears when a user interacts with a button.
description_zh: A list of options that appears when a user interacts with a button.

asChild.description: Use the provided child element as the default rendered element, combining their props and behavior.
asChild.description_zh: 使用提供的子元素作为默认渲染元素，结合它们的 props 和行为。

closeOnSelect.description: Whether the menu should be closed when the option is selected.
closeOnSelect.description_zh: 选择该选项时是否应关闭菜单。

disabled.description: Whether the menu item is disabled
disabled.description_zh: 菜单项是否处于禁用状态

valueText.description:
The textual value of the option. Used in typeahead navigation of the menu.
If not provided, the text content of the menu item will be used.
valueText.description_zh:
选项的文本值。用于菜单的 typeahead 导航。
如果未提供，则将使用菜单项的文本内容。
